name: newtovaux/platforminfo
description: PlatformInfo displays, ad-free and no-nag, important information to help you diagnose issues with your WordPress setup or plugin development.

deploy: docker-compose run --rm cli wp plugin deactivate --all
docker-compose run --rm cli wp plugin uninstall --all
docker-compose run --rm cli wp plugin install /plugin/platforminfo.zip --force --activate
new: docker-compose run --rm cli wp core install --url="http://localhost" --title=Test --admin_user=admin --admin_password=password --skip-email --admin_email="test@email.com"
wpupdate: docker-compose run --rm cli wp core update
docker-compose run --rm cli wp core update-db
docker-compose run --rm cli wp plugin update --all
docker-compose run --rm cli wp theme update --all
reset: docker-compose run --rm cli wp db reset --yes
